definitions: in a way that shows a readiness to give more of something, especially money, than is necessary or expected

examples.text: everyone is asked to give generously to this worthy cause

shortDefinitions: in way that shows readiness to give more of something than is necessary or expected

definitions: in a way that shows kindness or warmth toward others

examples.text: she graciously and generously acknowledges their influence

shortDefinitions: in a way that shows kindness or warmth towards others

definitions: enough or more than enough in size or amount; plentifully
